title: K-beauty facing China troubles
text: Jung Kwan Jang makes trade show debut at SupplySide West GS Caltex achieves Korea's first third-party carbon footprint verification HD Hyundai's Q3 operating profit sinks over reduced operating days SK Innovation to restore mangrove forests in Fiji Lunit joins 'Saudi Vision 2030 Healthcare Initiative' with AI tech Shin Hye-sun is the hero everyone aspires to be in 'Brave Citizen' Ulsan plant fueling Hyundai Motor's export growth Drunk driver sentenced to 12 years for killing girl in school zone Samyang adds 'Tom Yum' flavor to Buldak range STX stocks plunge after announcing issuance of forfeited shares worth $59M To write comments, please log in to one of the accounts.
